trans-unit.source: There must always be at least one essential cookie, as the sg_cookie_optin extension always sets the "cookie_optin" cookie to store the user preferences.

Name: cookie_optin
Provider: Your company name
Lifetime: The cookie lifetime value (default 1 year)
Purpose: Used to store your cookie preferences
Regular expressions are used to check whether a given text matches a certain pattern. Click to open the details for more information.

The value that you enter in the text field is the pattern and we will check each external content address against it. URLs that match this pattern will be whitelisted and the content elements will not be marked as external content.
To test whether the syntax works or it’s ok you can refer to https://regex101.com/. After you are done and save your preferences, make sure you open your page, clear the browser cache and reload it. Then try granting and removing the consent and see if any JavaScript errors appear in your console.
Regular expressions are used to check whether a given text matches a certain pattern. Click to open the details for more information.

The value that you enter in the text field is the pattern and we will check each web page address against it. The cookie banner will not be displayed on pages whose URL address matches any of the patterns.
To test whether the syntax works or it’s ok you can refer to https://regex101.com/. After you are done and save your preferences, make sure you open your page, clear the browser cache and reload it. Then go to one of the pages that you wanted the cookie banner not to be displayed on.
